name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: minimalist and simple to use to do list

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple easy to use minimalistic to-do list extension for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your productivity with our easy-to-use, minimalistic to-do list Chrome extension - no sign-in required! Have you ever found yourself forgetting important tasks while browsing the web? Or do you simply enjoy the satisfaction of checking off completed items on your to-do list? Our extension is here to help. Keep track of your tasks and stay on top of your day with our user-friendly interface.
